12.eng-name: The Book of The At-Tatbiq (Clasping One's Hands Together)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salim that his father said:"When the Prophet (ﷺ) started to pray he said the takbir and raised his hands, and when he bowed, and after bowing, but he did not raise them between the two prostrations

chapter.eng-name: Not doing that between the two prostrations
